column4: Hi all, I just convert my file-system to Ext4 -- is it true the old files which created on Ext3 not benefit from new Ext4 ?
ive never heard that.. and i dont see why that would be true
I see this from the atrical which help me to convert the file system but they not put any more details about this issue
for linyx filesystems you must have the proper owndership of the files/dirs.. you dont override them with mount options
or use sudo.. but that then will make the files owned by root.
do the work with root user permisisons..
